title: [BUG] Mundo cleavers invisible
body: Just spent a game getting hit by invisible mundo cleavers. Their team could see it, ours couldn't

replies.body:
Yeah Nidalee Spears are invis somterimes too and so are Morg's bindings when you use the Blackthorn skin.

These kinds of bugs happen after every patch. Will probably be fixed without Riot publicly addressing the problem in the next patch
